name: The flame of life
description:
Keep alive the flame of life by picking positive emotions

Made for the following 2 game jams that were taking place at the same time:

- the Nordic Game Jam 2020, theme: Everyday magic.

- Ludum Dare 46, theme: Keep it alive.

Suggested to be played in FULLSCREEN for the the best experience.

Made by Taranjit Singh & Maurizio Lu.
